name: Chandler J.
highlight: Fantastic Job on my Stage 8 Icon Install
testimonial: The THOR Off-Road team did a fantastic job on my Stage 8 Icon install for my 3rd Gen Tacoma. With all the shipping delays occurring, the parts came in much faster than anticipated and communication was on-point. Install was completed efficiently with everything tested, torqued, and QC'd perfectly. Highly recommend these guys for any off-road auto needs.
